remarks: Define a canonical mapping between finite relations (finite subsets of a cartesian product) and functions with finite support into finite subsets (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)
statement:
fpwrelmap.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
fpwrelmap.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
fpwrelmap.3 $e |- M = ( f e. ( ~P B ^m A ) |-> { <. x , y >. | ( x e. A /\ y e. ( f ` x ) ) } ) $.
fpwrelmapffs.1 $e |- S = { f e. ( ( ~P B i^i Fin ) ^m A ) | ( f supp (/) ) e. Fin } $.
fpwrelmapffs $p |- ( M |` S ) : S -1-1-onto-> ( ~P ( A X. B ) i^i Fin ) $.
$d A f x y $.
$d B f x y $.
